mapper.insert: insert into app_appointment_record (id, user_code, user_name, opt_time, appoint_time, doctor_code, doctor_name, hospital, department, disease, finish_time, fail_reason, hospital_code, hospital_name, department_code, department_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appointTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_appointment_record set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_time = #{optTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appoint_time = #{appointTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_code = #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor_name = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, disease = #{disease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fail_reason = #{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_code = #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_name = #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_code, user_name, opt_time, appoint_time, doctor_code, doctor_name, hospital, department, disease, finish_time, fail_reason, hospital_code, hospital_name, department_code, department_name from app_appointment_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, user_code, user_name, opt_time, appoint_time, doctor_code, doctor_name, hospital, department, disease, finish_time, fail_reason, hospital_code, hospital_name, department_code, department_name from app_appointment_record ORDER BY appoint_time DESC

select id, user_code, user_name, opt_time, appoint_time, doctor_code, doctor_name, hospital, department, disease, finish_time, fail_reason, hospital_code, hospital_name, department_code, department_name from app_appointment_record where user_code = #{0}
SELECT * FROM app_appointment_record where user_code = #{0} and appoint_time = #{1}
